Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2008 08:58PM moeknows2 wrote: hi ivy, i understand, i feel guilty for feeling lucky. and i worry, always. i had the same dx as you, dcis, stage 0. july/2007. doesn't make us worry anyless i don't think, it's still a hard thing to go through.i didn't sleep well for a while either, but that is much better now. the biggest thing for me is a sense of 'i don't care' not that i don't care about myself, family, etc. just that the things that would have drove me insane before bc, now, just aren't a big deal! people around me have a hard time with this, but it is invigorating for me! : )Â  Hang in there! like you, i come here and read so many stories, my heart also goes out to all. Moe dx July/2007 dcis stage 0
